title: Playback
description: Settings related to playback and supported codec and media types

children.title: MPEG 2 Support
children.description: Support direct play of MPEG 2 content (e.g. Live TV). This will prevent transcoding of MPEG 2 content, but uses significantly more bandwidth

title: User Interface
description: Settings relating to how the how the application looks

children.title: Blur Unwatched Episodes
children.description: If enabled, images for unwatched episodes will be blurred.

children.title: Use Splashscreen as Screensaver Background
children.description: Use generated splashscreen image as Jellyfin's screensaver background.

children.title: Design Elements
children.description: Options that alter the design of Jellyfin.

children.title: Use Splashscreen as Home Background
children.description: Use generated splashscreen image as Jellyfin home background. Jellyfin will need to be closed and reopened for change to take effect.

children.title: Item Count
children.description: Show item count in the library, and index of selected item.

children.title: Item Titles
children.description: Always show the titles below the poster images. (If disabled, title will be shown under hilighted item only)

children.title: Return to Top
children.description: Use the replay button to slowly animate to the first item in the folder. (If disabled, The folder will reset to the first item immediately)
